string.value: #p1101002# seems to want to talk to me about something...
#p1101002# asked me if I had mastered all the skills I possessed, and he also confided in me that the Chief Knights came up with new skills again. Then he challenged me to learn that as well.
#p1101002# asked me if I had mastered all the skills I possessed, and he also confided in me that the Chief Knights came up with new skills again. Then he challenged me to learn that as well.
Have you been mastering your skills? I am sure you've mastered all your skills, which means... it's time for you to learn a #bnew skill#k, right?
Well, what you're doing right now doesn't make you appear humble. You just look complacent, and that's never a good thing.

#bChief Knights#k must have come up with another skill. Don't just stand here, find a way to learn that skill for yourself! I am sure the Chief Knights will be against it, but... acquiring the skill will depend purely on your abilities.
